title: Use warp shuffles in cuda varInnermostDim
body_html:
Use warp shuffle to reduce inside THCTensor_kernel_varInnermostDim. This eliminates the need to use some of the shared memory.

Here are some performance numbers: https://gist.github.com/zou3519/c34e46352f13034d5ee0a6b8148e5557

Doing the warp shuffle makes this slightly faster than before, if at all.

cc @colesbury @ngimel

Test Play

python test/test_cuda.py
